entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add "Who built this" to `dotnet --info` #37725
  • Error NU1301: `dotnet tool install` #37714
  • `dotnet` should report .NET not MSBuild version #37713
  • `UseMSBuildTestInfrastructure` doesn't work for multi-tfm #37712
  • [BUG] 'To build this project, the following workloads must be installed: maui-android', but the workload is already installed #37706

Closed

  • dotnet build always throwing error #17411
    Discussion
  • maybe just leave it as is as it's fine on 12. The only reason we moved some to 13 is that there wasn't enough infrastructure on branding day to support all branches on 12. #37698
  • `dotnet restore` does not support `-f TFM` #35408
  • dotnet tools not working in linux #37703
  • NativeAOT: Allow *completely static* executables to be built on Linux (Alpine) #37643

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.102 #37724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.406 #37723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.313 #37722
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.116 #37721
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.419 #37720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.322 #37719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.127 #37718
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dotnet-format to the SDK repo #37717
    Area-Format
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37715
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Dedup version for workload version subcommand Fixes #35920 #36085
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2343499 #37680
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Provide new default for runtime identifier Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
